full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Title
Project Title (English): Rehabilitation of the Components of the Cathodic Protection, Baie-Sainte-Catherine Wharf
Project Title (French):Réfection des composantes de la protection cathodique, Quai de Baie-Sainte-Catherine

## Reference and Tender Information
- **Reference Number**: WS4137138951-Doc4138486874
- **Solicitation Number**: WS4137138951
- **Amendment Number**: 1
- **Publication Date**: August 9, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date**: August 29, 2023 02:00 PM
- **Amendment Date**: August 28, 2023
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: September 7, 2023
- **Expected Contract End Date**: December 1, 2023

## Data and Procurement Details
- **Classification Code (UNSPC)**: 72141200
- **UNSPC Description**: Marine construction services
- **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive – Open Bidding

## Agency Details
- **Contracting Entity Name**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **Contracting Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
- **End User Entity Name**: Parks Canada Agency (PC)
- **End User Entity Address**: 30 Victoria Street, Gatineau, Quebec J8X 0B3, Canada

## Contact Information
- **Contract Officer Name**: Ratte, Julien (SPAC/PSPC)
- **Contract Officer Email**: julien.ratte@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Notice URL

Notice URL (French): http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17120541?extsite=MTcxMjA1NDFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
